name: cardano-agent-kit
description: A TypeScript SDK for interacting with Cardano blockchain agents

scripts.test:langchain: cd examples/cardano-langchain-chat && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.test:vercel-ai: cd examples/vercel-ai-demo && npm i && npm run dev
scripts.update:vercel-ai: cd examples/vercel-ai-demo && npm i && npm i cardano-agent-kit && npm run dev
scripts.update:langchain: cd examples/cardano-langchain-chat && npm i && npm i cardano-agent-kit && npm run dev
scripts.update:toolkit: cd examples/cardano-toolkit && npm i && npm i cardano-agent-kit && npm start
scripts.test:toolkit: cd examples/cardano-toolkit && npm i && npm start
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm publish && npm run update:toolkit
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm publish && npm run update:toolkit
scripts.major: npm version major && npm publish && npm run update:toolkit

author: VARMETA
